cobblemon_quests.task.actions.tooltip: The deeds the user must perform to fulfill the quest.
cobblemon_quests.task.pokemons.tooltip: The possible Creatures of Poké the user can interact with to fulfill the quest. If the list is empty, any Creature of Poké counts for the quest.
cobblemon_quests.task.amount.tooltip: The quantity of Creatures of Poké.
cobblemon_quests.task.shiny.tooltip: If the Creature of Poké must be shiny to fulfill the quest.
cobblemon_quests.task.genders.tooltip: The possible sexes of the Creatures of Poké.
cobblemon_quests.task.forms.tooltip: The possible forms of the Creatures of Poké (Common, Alolan, Galarian, etc.)
cobblemon_quests.task.pokemon_types.tool: The allowed kinds of the Creatures of Poké (Fire, Water, Grass, etc.)
cobblemon_quests.task.regions.tooltip: The allowed lands of the Creatures of Poké (Kanto, Johto, Hoenn, etc.)
cobblemon_quests.task.pokeballs.tooltip: The Orb of Capture that the Creature of Poké in question has been or needs to be captured with.
cobblemon_quests.task.dimensions.tooltip: The realms the user must be in to fulfill the quest. (Overworld, Nether, End)
cobblemon_quests.task.biomes.tooltip: The environments the user must be in to fulfill the quest.
cobblemon_quests.task.time_min.tooltip: The earliest hour for the user to fulfill the quest. (inclusive)
cobblemon_quests.task.time_max.tooltip: The latest hour for the user to fulfill the quest. (non-inclusive)
